circumstances: En route from Kansas City to Oklahoma City, the twin engine airplane was in normal cruise when control was lost. It entered a dive, suffered an overload failure then crashed in an open field. The pilot, sole on board, was killed.
probable_cause:
Airframe failure and fire or explosion in flight for undetermined reasons. The following findings were reported:
- Overload failure, 
- Fire in wing,
- Separation in flight, 
- Altitude varied between 14,500 and 15,300 feet during last 4 minutes of flight.
